nodes.text: The South Sector Sinners, nicknamed Southies, was a criminal organization operating on the planet Burnin Konn. It employed thugs and hoodlums.

Riley worked with the Sinners for roughly two months during her sibling's youth, and had a negative experience with the Kyuzo Khalu. The Sinners looted the entire cargo of the Cruel Mistress after it was shot down over Burnin Konn by the Galactic Empire after the Battle of Endor. Riley's sibling hunted down their takings on a mission from "Happy" Dapp, during which he killed Khalu and other Sinners.
The South Sector Sinners first appeared in the 2015 mobile game Star Wars: Uprising.
